Text:
Why is this one track?
It's gonna be a pain in the a** to separate it into separate tracks. I wonder what program to use to separate flac files, as I've only edited mp3s before.

Thanks for the beautiful music non-the-less!

Muchissimas gracias sin embargo!

I see you have a lot of good music, but all in single flac files per disc. Why?
If I burn this to a cd does the cue file add the tracks?
I don't wanna burn cds though. I play all my music from my computer or mobile.

Tulkoju, all your questions are answered here:
